title: Meetings and events at Conrad London St. James
text:
Meetings and events at Conrad London St. James Meetings and events at Conrad London St. James Details Category: Hotel Created   16:15 Located in historic Westminster, Conrad London St. James is perfectly positioned for memorable social and corporate events. Featuring over 7,000 sq. ft. of elegant meeting space on a dedicated floor, the hotel is ideal for hosting up to 300 people. 
Guests can also choose from locations such as Emmeline’s Lounge or Blue Boar Restaurant, which offer quintessential British charm suitable for any event. Conferences Conrad London St. James offers exceptionally high levels of service throughout its 7 exclusive spaces, aptly named after the most celebrated political residences. Chevening and Dorneywood cater for up to 60 and 50 in theatre style respectively, while Chequers is a fixed boardroom for up to 10 delegates providing the latest in-built technology. Whitehall Suite can also be taken as one large room for up to 300 reception style, or divided to create four individual meeting spaces, each hosting up to 65 people theatre style. Day Delegate packages are also available and include WiFi, room hire, bespoke coffee breaks, stationery and a tailored working lunch. Accommodations Attendees staying in the hotel will be delighted by complimentary Wi-Fi & Nespresso machines, while those who book Executive Rooms, Suites and Diamond Tier HHonors members have exclusive access to the Executive Lounge, providing a quiet space to relax and recharge with complimentary refreshments. Corporate travelers can take advantage of the hotel’s superb central location within close proximity to key London business districts. Events Conrad London St. James is perfectly placed to cater for social events. All event spaces feature advanced technology and A/V equipment, and a dedicated events team to take care of every detail, and develop a bespoke package for a successful event Celebrate a special occasion with an elegant champagne and canapé reception in the foyer before dinner in the Whitehall Suite, accommodating up to 300 guests reception style or 220 banquet style. Alternatively, host smaller celebrations in the Whitehall 1&2 for 150 guests, or in Chevening for 50 guest reception style. Blue Boar Restaurant Meanwhile, for a sophisticated yet traditional British atmosphere, Blue Boar Restaurant offers two elegant private dining rooms for up to 10 guests each, or one combined space for 20 guests. Fresh, regional ingredients deliver mouth-watering cuisine that celebrates the very best of what each British season brings. Farm sourced succulent meats and freshly caught seafood from the Devon and Cornwall coastline feature on a menu that is sure to impress guests. Emmeline’s Lounge Named after the 19th century British political activist in the Suffragette Movement, Emmeline Pankhurst, Emmeline’s Lounge is the perfect venue to enjoy a stylish and seasonal British afternoon tea or hold a relaxed business meeting. Private space can be hired for groups with up to 100 guests, offering an ideal venue for a stylish wedding reception or special occasions. Blue Boar Bar Blue Boar Bar can also accommodate between 250 and 300 guests for a standing reception or host smaller events in the Private Drinking Room, an exclusive and discreet den featuring low lighting, sumptuous leather sofas and relaxed décor for 6 people.
